TEXT.TITLE: M.D.C. ASSET INVESTORS <MIR> IN INITIAL PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: M.D.C. Asset Investors Inc, which recently went public, said its board declared an initial quarterly dividend of 45 cts per share, payable April 15 to holders of record April One. Reuter
